mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of John C. Brown as a student. Pose 1 shows him wearing a suit and tie. Pose 2 shows him wearing a graduation gown. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of John C. Brown (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
Washington and Lee University
Students
